title: Vegan maple chilli
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '4 carrots, finely sliced', '1 to 2 red chillies, finely chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '200g sweetcorn', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', 'salt and black pepper, to taste', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 1/2 tablespoons tomato puree', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 tablespoons water', '1 to 2 handfuls grated vegan cheese']
